summary: Adds a craftable Headsman\'s Axe to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a craftable Headsman\'s Axe to the game, that you can see on various occasions. (E.G In the beheading when you start a new game, and the first time you enter Solitude.)

The axe is in iron category, and to craft it you\'ll need 3 iron ingots and 2 leather strips.
It might be a bit overpowered if you have a high level in twohanded weapons.

Installation:
Just extract Executioners.esp to C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\ And enable  Executioners.esp in Skyrim launcher.
author: SmegMaster
